Known Bugs
Table of Contents

Known Bugs

Problems and issues that haven't been fixed


  • Private variables aren't hidden, so other routines can erroneously try to use other routine's variables rather than giving an undeclared compile error
  • The preprocessor may occaisonally emit incorrect code by incorrect offset, or not replacing the correct tokens.
  • When tracing embedded code, the debugger might highlight the line above the current line.
  • Using 'sequence of' is still buggy, and may not work correctly, either in execution of preprocessing.
